Level up your gaming experience with our consultation with expert !

Please place your finger on the device's camera, covering the flash as well. After 10 seconds, you can export the results through the menu. 

This utility works by measuring the amount of red it sees through the camera, and attempting to detect the fluctuations. 
It works better in a darkened room, and when the pressure on the camera is constant. 
If there are multiple cameras on your device, make sure that your finger covers the entire field of view in the small viewfinder. 
Once the measurement is complete, it can be exported or repeated through the menu.
Camera permission is required for this application to work.
Measurement without flash is less reliable.
